customer_name: PUPPY LOVE KENNEL L L C

citations.narrative:
Exposed floor drains which were lacking a cover were observed in an enclosure housing four dogs. The holes were large
enough to allow the dogs' feet to fall through, which could potentially cause injury. Enclosures need to be constructed and
maintained in a manner which will protect the dogs from injury. The licensee must correct this issue.
**********Correct by May 30, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n
